page.title: 02Upton Magna Post Office
page.content: The Postmaster of Upton Magna Post Office is Mr.Oldham. He has had his job for 19 years at various post offices.The post office has been built for approx.13 years.It is open Monday, Tuesday,Thursday and Friday 7.30am _ 1.00pm and 2.00pm_5.30pm.On Wednesdays and Saturdays the post office is open for half a day from 7.30am_1.00pm.And on Sundays the post office is closed. The postman collects the mail at 8.30am and 3.30pm except on Sundays and Bank Holidays. The postbox is stood on a black pole but in the old post office the postbox was placed in the wall and it was opened from the interior of the post office.Most of the people in the village use it every day except Sundays,so about 100 different people use it regularly. The busiest times are 7.30am_9.45am daily, except Sundays.Mondays are usually
